attributes.action: Stop the planed cutbacks within the Armed Forces and also the Territorial Army
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop the savage and demoralising Army cost-saving plans to cut back on all TA training for six months. To give our Regular and Reserves Forces the equipment and training.

rejection.details:
You may wish to add your name to the petitions listed below:  
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/TAcuts/
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/EQUIPOURHEROES/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
